item.title: Language agnostic steno theory
item.description:
What a glorious weekend. What a joy. In two days I implemented

language agnostic steno theory

There is code at the bottom but lets focus on the theory first.

My take on why steno is appealing Link to heading

200 wpm non invasive hmi. Full words: 200 words per minute without a chip and usb port in your head interface for commanding a machine. Basically thought speed interface. Appealing. As short as that! A chip in your heard has r/w and idea of w in my head already creeps me out even without a chip so no thank you. So demanding muscle memory training it is.
